sourcesContent: import { AnchorHTMLAttributes, ButtonHTMLAttributes } from 'react' import * as S from './styles' type ButtonTypes = | AnchorHTMLAttributes | ButtonHTMLAttributes export type ButtonProps = { icon?: JSX.Element size?: 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' fullWidth?: boolean as?: React.ElementType } & ButtonTypes const Button = ({ icon, children, size = 'medium', fullWidth = false, ...props }: ButtonProps) => ( {icon} {!!children && {children}} ) export default Button
